<Text:<The Lakeside Press Building
1:
--------------------
<Text: Lakeside Press Building:  The building served as a showroom, office, and printing press for the Lakeside Press.>
Triplets:<Lakeside Press Building
3:
--------------------
Text: Lakeside Press Building:  Architect Howard Van Doren Shaw designed the building, his first design of a commercial building.
Triplets:<Lakeside Press Building
4:
--------------------
<Text: Lakeside Press Building:  Shaw's design features limestone quoins, piers, and decorations, curtain walls with cast iron spandrels on the floors housing the printing presses, and a projecting cornice.>
